channel.title: [508] Weapon Help
channel.description:
I am running a 508 server, mithscape is my base.
The special attack for weapons such as ; armadyl godsword, sara godsword, bandos godsword, dds, etc only hit players and do no damage too monsters, or atleast to bosses. And when they hit players they don't hit high. They hit fairly common and high without the special but when I activate it it normally results in a 0. How can I make it where it actually hits the npcs, and does higher damage too players? If I made this unclear(which I probably did, I'm not good about explaining situations) please tell me so I can make it clearer, I really want to fix this problem.

item.title: [508] Weapon Help
item.dc:creator: @kevinberg kevinberg
item.description:
@kevinberg wrote:

first of all, mithscape is not a base, its a source ur base is paldino76

anyway, here you go:

go into: src -> paldino76 -> rs2 -> player -> combat -> playercombat.java

than search for:

if (p.equipment[3] == 11694) { /* Armadyl Godsword */

under that it will say like:

maxHit *= 3.47;

change the 3.47 to another number to increase ur change of hitting, but this will also make you hit higher i would suggest don’t go above 4 because than u’ll hit constant 70’s and higher, if you need more help about ur source i can help you out

kevin.

Read full topic
